definition: flag used as a shop sign/variant of 簾|帘[lian2]
lit. to govern from behind the curtain/to rule in place of the emperor (idiom)
cord fabric used in vehicle tires
hanging screen/curtain over shop door (for privacy and serving as advertisement)
(idiom) to greet the eye/to come into view
cave with a waterfall at its mouth

sentences.english: The slats of the blind could be seen to tremble at every shot.
sentences.chinese: 她每打一枪，就可以看到百叶帘在颤动。

sentences.english: The slatted window-shade casts a film noir shadow on her.
sentences.chinese: 百叶窗帘在她身上投下朦胧的黑色阴影。

sentences.english: Gently the willow fluff wafts to the embroidered screen.
sentences.chinese: 游丝软系飘春榭，落絮轻沾扑绣帘。

sentences.english: Drapes that hang at the edge of the ceiling and end at the floor also emphasize this effect.
sentences.chinese: 在天花板外沿和地板之间挂上帐帘，也有同样的效果。

sentences.english: Blinds can be installed internally, not easy to dirty, no-clean.
sentences.chinese: 百叶帘可安装在内部，不容易脏，免清洗。

sentences.english: The shutters thumped the wall in the wind.
sentences.chinese: 在风中，百叶窗帘砰砰地碰着墙。

sentences.english: The word "curtain" is widely used in graceful and restrained poems in Tang and Song Dyna-sty.
sentences.chinese: “帘”意象在唐宋婉约词中应用范围极其广泛。

sentences.english: Among these were a relay booster for telegraph lines and a fire-safety curtain for theaters.
sentences.chinese: 其中包括电报线路的继电调压器和剧院防火帘。

sentences.english: Softly the gossamer floats over spring pavilions, Gently the willow fluff wafts to the embroidered screen.
sentences.chinese: 游丝软系飘春榭，落絮轻沾扑绣帘。

sentences.english: Spade in hand, I go out from under my fine curtain
sentences.chinese: 手把花锄出绣帘，忍踏落花来复去。

sentences.english: Use adjustable shade screens or deep overhangs to the east and west.
sentences.chinese: 在东面和西面采用可调节式的遮阳帘或者长长的挑檐。

sentences.english: The green moss creeps onto the doorsteps, The lush grass is reflected through the bamboo curtains.
sentences.chinese: 苔藓给阶前铺上绿毯，芳草把帘内映得碧青。

sentences.english: The lab could be equipped with a shutter w made of non-cotton and non-synthetic fibre materials.
sentences.chinese: 实验室安装百叶窗帘，不要使用布质和化纤材料窗帘。

sentences.english: Bin Laden’s gold-threaded robes worn during his video addresses hung behind a curtain in the media room.
sentences.chinese: 本拉登在讲话中穿的黄金丝线袍子挂在媒体室的帘后。

sentences.english: New renovation, wooden blind, sell or rent with partial furniture, direct owner, no commission.
sentences.chinese: 新装修连部份家私，木百页窗帘，业主自让免佣。

sentences.english: A rear power sunshade adds to passenger comfort on warm days.
sentences.chinese: 后部权力遮阳帘增加了乘客的舒适温暖的日子。

definition: hanging screen/curtain over shop door (for privacy and serving as advertisement)
cord fabric used in vehicle tires
to push aside (clothing, curtain etc) to reveal something/to toss aside
